2.title: TAX-ONOMY

4.title: IT'S ALL GREEK LETTERS TO ME

5.title: BILLBOARD'S TOP MONEY MAKERS OF 2011
clues: No. 1 with nearly $36 million was this young blonde country singer who still looks totally shocked after yet another award win

6.title: PHOENIX
clues: The Salt River Valley, home to Phoenix as well as Mesa & Tempe, is nicknamed "The Valley of" this
This airline once based in Phoenix merged with U.S. Airways & the arena once named for it is now the U.S. Airways Center
A popular activity in Phoenix is hiking this mountain that's said to resemble a certain animal kneeling, hence its name
DAILY DOUBLE
A gallery in Phoenix' Heard Museum is named for this Supreme Court justice who worked in Phoenix in the 1970s
Phoenix is the seat of Maricopa County, home to this sheriff who's made headlines for his crackdown on illegal immigrants

10.title: TO YOUR HEALTH
clues: Also known as renal lithiasis, these small, hard deposits can be made of mineral & acid salts

11.title: THESE PUNS ARE OFFAL
